EmailTemplate.description: Use this template as a receipt that you are reviewing customer case
EmailTemplate.name: Pending Review
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. We are currently reviewing your case and will let you know if we have any additional questions
Regards, Navigational Database Team Email: dsa@honeywell.com Phone: 602-436-6739
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
